VIII.iii.10.6.a
.
Presumptive SC Applicability
SC may be established for residuals of COVID-19 on a presumptive basis if evidence supports symptoms or a positive test for COVID-19 within the defined manifestation period.
References
:Â  For more information on
the defined manifestation period, see
38 U.S.C. 1164(a)(2)(A)
, and
M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iii, 10.A.1.e
, and
rating considerations for evaluating COVID-19, see
M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, 3.6
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iii, Chapter 10 - Presumptive Service Connection (SC) for Coronavirus Disease (COVID-19)
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iii, Chapter 10, Section None
